verses.verse: וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> went on יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> Then Jacob רַגְלָ֑יו <S%H7272><s%> his journey וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and came אַ֥רְצָה <S%H776><s%> into the land בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the people קֶֽדֶם׃ <S%H6924><s%> of the east

וַיַּ֞רְא <S%H7200><s%> And he looked וְהִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold בְאֵ֣ר <S%H875><s%> and behold a well בַּשָּׂדֶ֗ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold שָׁ֞ם <S%H8033><s%> there שְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <S%H7969><s%> and lo there [were] three עֶדְרֵי־ <S%H5739><s%> flocks צֹאן֙ <S%H6629><s%> of sheep רֹבְצִ֣ים <S%H7257><s%> lying עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> beside כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> that הַבְּאֵ֣ר <S%H875><s%> by it for out of that well הַהִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> they יַשְׁק֖וּ <S%H8248><s%> they watered הָעֲדָרִ֑ים <S%H5739><s%> the flocks וְהָאֶ֥בֶן <S%H68><s%> stone גְּדֹלָ֖ה <S%H1419><s%> and a great עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> beside פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> mouth הַבְּאֵֽר׃ <S%H875><s%> [was] upon the well's

וְנֶאֶסְפוּ־ <S%H622><s%> gathered שָׁ֣מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעֲדָרִ֗ים <S%H5739><s%> And thither were all the flocks וְגָלֲל֤וּ <S%H1556><s%> and they rolled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֶ֙בֶן֙ <S%H68><s%> the stone מֵעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> from פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> mouth הַבְּאֵ֔ר <S%H875><s%> from the well's וְהִשְׁק֖וּ <S%H8248><s%> and watered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצֹּ֑אן <S%H6629><s%> the sheep וְהֵשִׁ֧יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֶ֛בֶן <S%H68><s%> the stone עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> mouth הַבְּאֵ֖ר <S%H875><s%> upon the well's לִמְקֹמָֽהּ׃ <S%H4725><s%> in his place

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָהֶם֙ יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob אַחַ֖י <S%H251><s%> unto them My brethren מֵאַ֣יִן <S%H370><s%> whence אַתֶּ֑ם <S%H859><s%> and they וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> [be] ye? And they said מֵחָרָ֖ן <S%H2771><s%> Of Haran אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <S%H587><s%> we

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לָהֶ֔ם הַיְדַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> unto them Know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לָבָ֣ן <S%H3837><s%> ye Laban בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נָח֑וֹר <S%H5152><s%> Nahor וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> said יָדָֽעְנוּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> We know

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לָהֶ֖ם הֲשָׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> [He is] well ל֑וֹ וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> said שָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> is well וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> and here רָחֵ֣ל <S%H7354><s%> and behold Rachel בִּתּ֔וֹ <S%H1323><s%> his daughter בָּאָ֖ה <S%H935><s%> cometh עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הַצֹּֽאן׃ <S%H6629><s%> with the sheep

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said הֵ֥ן <S%H2005><s%> Lo עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> is still הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day גָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [it is] yet high לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not עֵ֖ת <S%H6256><s%> neither [is it] time הֵאָסֵ֣ף <S%H622><s%> should be gathered together הַמִּקְנֶ֑ה <S%H4735><s%> that the cattle הַשְׁק֥וּ <S%H8248><s%> water הַצֹּ֖אן <S%H6629><s%> ye the sheep וּלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> and go רְעֽוּ׃ <S%H7462><s%> [and] feed

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֮ <S%H559><s%> And they said לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not נוּכַל֒ <S%H3201><s%> We cannot עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after יֵאָֽסְפוּ֙ <S%H622><s%> be gathered together כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָ֣עֲדָרִ֔ים <S%H5739><s%> until all the flocks וְגָֽלֲלוּ֙ <S%H1556><s%> and [till] they roll אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֶ֔בֶן <S%H68><s%> the stone מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> from פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> mouth הַבְּאֵ֑ר <S%H875><s%> from the well's וְהִשְׁקִ֖ינוּ <S%H8248><s%> then we water הַצֹּֽאן׃ <S%H6629><s%> the sheep

עוֹדֶ֖נּוּ <S%H5750><s%> And while he yet מְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake עִמָּ֑ם <S%H5973><s%> them וְרָחֵ֣ל ׀ <S%H7354><s%> with them Rachel בָּ֗אָה <S%H935><s%> came עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הַצֹּאן֙ <S%H6629><s%> sheep אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after לְאָבִ֔יהָ <S%H1><s%> with her father's כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for רֹעָ֖ה <S%H7462><s%> for she kept them הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וַיְהִ֡י <S%H1961><s%> become כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> after רָאָ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> saw יַעֲקֹ֜ב <S%H3290><s%> And it came to pass when Jacob אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רָחֵ֗ל <S%H7354><s%> Rachel בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter לָבָן֙ <S%H3837><s%> of Laban אֲחִ֣י <S%H251><s%> brother אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> his mother's וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> and the sheep לָבָ֖ן <S%H3837><s%> of Laban אֲחִ֣י <S%H251><s%> brother אִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> his mother's וַיִּגַּ֣שׁ <S%H5066><s%> went near יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> that Jacob וַיָּ֤גֶל <S%H1556><s%> and rolled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֶ֙בֶן֙ <S%H68><s%> the stone מֵעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> from פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> mouth הַבְּאֵ֔ר <S%H875><s%> from the well's וַיַּ֕שְׁקְ <S%H8248><s%> and watered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> the flock לָבָ֖ן <S%H3837><s%> of Laban אֲחִ֥י <S%H251><s%> brother אִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H517><s%> his mother's

וַיִּשַּׁ֥ק <S%H5401><s%> kissed יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob לְרָחֵ֑ל <S%H7354><s%> Rachel וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> and lifted up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קֹל֖וֹ <S%H6963><s%> his voice וַיֵּֽבְךְּ׃ <S%H1058><s%> and wept

וַיַּגֵּ֨ד <S%H5046><s%> told יַעֲקֹ֜ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob לְרָחֵ֗ל <S%H7354><s%> Rachel כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲחִ֤י <S%H251><s%> brother אָבִ֙יהָ֙ <S%H1><s%> that he [was] her father's ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְכִ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> son רִבְקָ֖ה <S%H7259><s%> and that he [was] Rebekah's ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> and she וַתָּ֖רָץ <S%H7323><s%> and she ran וַתַּגֵּ֥ד <S%H5046><s%> and told לְאָבִֽיהָ׃ <S%H1><s%> her father

וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> become כִשְׁמֹ֨עַ <S%H8085><s%> heard לָבָ֜ן <S%H3837><s%> And it came to pass when Laban אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֣מַע ׀ <S%H8088><s%> the tidings יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son אֲחֹת֗וֹ <S%H269><s%> his sister's וַיָּ֤רָץ <S%H7323><s%> that he ran לִקְרָאתוֹ֙ <S%H7125><s%> to meet וַיְחַבֶּק־ <S%H2263><s%> him and embraced לוֹ֙ וַיְנַשֶּׁק־ <S%H5401><s%> him and kissed ל֔וֹ וַיְבִיאֵ֖הוּ <S%H935><s%> him and brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> him to his house וַיְסַפֵּ֣ר <S%H5608><s%> And he told לְלָבָ֔ן <S%H3837><s%> Laban אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> all these things הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לוֹ֙ לָבָ֔ן <S%H3837><s%> And Laban אַ֛ךְ <S%H389><s%> to him Surely עַצְמִ֥י <S%H6106><s%> thou [art] my bone וּבְשָׂרִ֖י <S%H1320><s%> and my flesh אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> and he וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> And he abode עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with חֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> of a month יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> with him the space

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָבָן֙ <S%H3837><s%> And Laban לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> unto Jacob הֲכִי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because אָחִ֣י <S%H251><s%> Because thou [art] my brother אַ֔תָּה <S%H859><s%> you וַעֲבַדְתַּ֖נִי <S%H5647><s%> shouldest thou therefore serve חִנָּ֑ם <S%H2600><s%> free הַגִּ֥ידָה <S%H5046><s%> bewray לִּ֖י מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what מַּשְׂכֻּרְתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H4909><s%> me what [shall] thy wages

וּלְלָבָ֖ן <S%H3837><s%> And Laban שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> had two בָנ֑וֹת <S%H1323><s%> daughters שֵׁ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> the name הַגְּדֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> of the elder לֵאָ֔ה <S%H3812><s%> [was] Leah וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> and the name הַקְּטַנָּ֖ה <S%H6996><s%> of the younger רָחֵֽל׃ <S%H7354><s%> [was] Rachel

וְעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> eyed לֵאָ֖ה <S%H3812><s%> Leah רַכּ֑וֹת <S%H7390><s%> [was] tender וְרָחֵל֙ <S%H7354><s%> but Rachel הָֽיְתָ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> become יְפַת־ <S%H3303><s%> and well תֹּ֖אַר <S%H8389><s%> of form וִיפַ֥ת <S%H3303><s%> was beautiful מַרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H4758><s%> favoured

וַיֶּאֱהַ֥ב <S%H157><s%> loved יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רָחֵ֑ל <S%H7354><s%> Rachel וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֶֽעֱבָדְךָ֙ <S%H5647><s%> I will serve שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> thee seven שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> years בְּרָחֵ֥ל <S%H7354><s%> for Rachel בִּתְּךָ֖ <S%H1323><s%> daughter הַקְּטַנָּֽה׃ <S%H6996><s%> thy younger

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָבָ֗ן <S%H3837><s%> And Laban ט֚וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [It is] better תִּתִּ֣י <S%H5414><s%> that I give אֹתָ֣הּ <S%H853><s%> לָ֔ךְ מִתִּתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> her to thee than that I should give אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H582><s%> her to אַחֵ֑ר <S%H312><s%> her to another שְׁבָ֖ה <S%H3427><s%> abide עִמָּדִֽי׃ <S%H5978><s%> against

וַיַּעֲבֹ֧ד <S%H5647><s%> served יַעֲקֹ֛ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob בְּרָחֵ֖ל <S%H7354><s%> for Rachel שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven שָׁנִ֑ים <S%H8141><s%> years וַיִּהְי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְעֵינָיו֙ <S%H5869><s%> and they seemed כְּיָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> days אֲחָדִ֔ים <S%H259><s%> unto him [but] a few בְּאַהֲבָת֖וֹ <S%H157><s%> love אֹתָֽהּ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יַעֲקֹ֤ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to לָבָן֙ <S%H3837><s%> unto Laban הָבָ֣ה <S%H3051><s%> Give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִשְׁתִּ֔י <S%H802><s%> [me] my wife כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for מָלְא֖וּ <S%H4390><s%> are fulfilled יָמָ֑י <S%H3117><s%> for my days וְאָב֖וֹאָה <S%H935><s%> that I may go in אֵלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיֶּאֱסֹ֥ף <S%H622><s%> gathered together לָבָ֛ן <S%H3837><s%> And Laban אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H582><s%> all the men הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> of the place וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and made מִשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <S%H4960><s%> a feast

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become בָעֶ֔רֶב <S%H6153><s%> And it came to pass in the evening וַיִּקַּח֙ <S%H3947><s%> that he took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֵאָ֣ה <S%H3812><s%> Leah בִתּ֔וֹ <S%H1323><s%> his daughter וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> and brought אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> about וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> her to him and he went in אֵלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H413><s%> also

וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> gave לָבָן֙ <S%H3837><s%> And Laban לָ֔הּ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זִלְפָּ֖ה <S%H2153><s%> Zilpah שִׁפְחָת֑וֹ <S%H8198><s%> his maid לְלֵאָ֥ה <S%H3812><s%> Leah בִתּ֖וֹ <S%H1323><s%> unto his daughter שִׁפְחָֽה׃ <S%H8198><s%> [for] an handmaid

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> came בַבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> And it came to pass that in the morning וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> it was לֵאָ֑ה <S%H3812><s%> behold it [was] Leah וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to לָבָ֗ן <S%H3837><s%> to Laban מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What זֹּאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> you עָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> What [is] this thou hast done לִּ֔י הֲלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> for בְרָחֵל֙ <S%H7354><s%> Rachel עָבַ֣דְתִּי <S%H5647><s%> unto me? did not I serve עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> with וְלָ֖מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why רִמִּיתָֽנִי׃ <S%H7411><s%> deceived

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָבָ֔ן <S%H3837><s%> And Laban לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> must not be so יֵעָשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> It must not be so done כֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> in בִּמְקוֹמֵ֑נוּ <S%H4725><s%> in our country לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> to give הַצְּעִירָ֖ה <S%H6810><s%> the younger לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הַבְּכִירָֽה׃ <S%H1067><s%> the firstborn

מַלֵּ֖א <S%H4390><s%> Fulfil שְׁבֻ֣עַ <S%H7620><s%> week זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> her וְנִתְּנָ֨ה <S%H5414><s%> and we will give לְךָ֜ גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> for בַּעֲבֹדָה֙ <S%H5656><s%> thee this also for the service אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which תַּעֲבֹ֣ד <S%H5647><s%> which thou shalt serve עִמָּדִ֔י <S%H5978><s%> against ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again שֶֽׁבַע־ <S%H7651><s%> with me yet seven שָׁנִ֥ים <S%H8141><s%> years אֲחֵרֽוֹת׃ <S%H312><s%> other

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did יַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob כֵּ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> so וַיְמַלֵּ֖א <S%H4390><s%> so and fulfilled שְׁבֻ֣עַ <S%H7620><s%> her week זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> and he וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> and he gave ל֛וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רָחֵ֥ל <S%H7354><s%> him Rachel בִּתּ֖וֹ <S%H1323><s%> his daughter ל֥וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> to wife

וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> gave לָבָן֙ <S%H3837><s%> And Laban לְרָחֵ֣ל <S%H7354><s%> to Rachel בִּתּ֔וֹ <S%H1323><s%> his daughter אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּלְהָ֖ה <S%H1090><s%> Bilhah שִׁפְחָת֑וֹ <S%H8198><s%> his handmaid לָ֖הּ לְשִׁפְחָֽה׃ <S%H8198><s%> to be her maid

וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> And he went in גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> also אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to רָחֵ֔ל <S%H7354><s%> also unto Rachel וַיֶּאֱהַ֥ב <S%H157><s%> and he loved גַּֽם־ <S%H1571><s%> and indeed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רָחֵ֖ל <S%H7354><s%> also Rachel מִלֵּאָ֑ה <S%H3812><s%> more than Leah וַיַּעֲבֹ֣ד <S%H5647><s%> and served עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again שֶֽׁבַע־ <S%H7651><s%> with him yet seven שָׁנִ֥ים <S%H8141><s%> years אֲחֵרֽוֹת׃ <S%H312><s%> other

וַיַּ֤רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And when the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שְׂנוּאָ֣ה <S%H8130><s%> [was] hated לֵאָ֔ה <S%H3812><s%> that Leah וַיִּפְתַּ֖ח <S%H6605><s%> he opened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רַחְמָ֑הּ <S%H7358><s%> her womb וְרָחֵ֖ל <S%H7354><s%> but Rachel עֲקָרָֽה׃ <S%H6135><s%> [was] barren

וַתַּ֤הַר <S%H2029><s%> conceived לֵאָה֙ <S%H3812><s%> And Leah וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and bare בֵּ֔ן <S%H1121><s%> a son וַתִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> and she called שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name רְאוּבֵ֑ן <S%H7205><s%> Reuben כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אָֽמְרָ֗ה <S%H559><s%> she said כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Surely רָאָ֤ה <S%H7200><s%> hath looked יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּעָנְיִ֔י <S%H6040><s%> upon my affliction כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> now therefore עַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> now יֶאֱהָבַ֥נִי <S%H157><s%> will love אִישִֽׁי׃ <S%H376><s%> my husband

וַתַּ֣הַר <S%H2029><s%> And she conceived עוֹד֮ <S%H5750><s%> again וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> again and bare בֵּן֒ <S%H1121><s%> a son וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because שָׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> hath heard יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Because the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because שְׂנוּאָ֣ה <S%H8130><s%> that I [was] hated אָנֹ֔כִי <S%H595><s%> He וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> he hath therefore given לִ֖י גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זֶ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וַתִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> me this [son] also and she called שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name שִׁמְעֽוֹן׃ <S%H8095><s%> Simeon

וַתַּ֣הַר <S%H2029><s%> And she conceived again עוֹד֮ <S%H5750><s%> again וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and bare בֵּן֒ <S%H1121><s%> a son וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said עַתָּ֤ה <S%H6258><s%> Now הַפַּ֙עַם֙ <S%H6471><s%> Now this time יִלָּוֶ֤ה <S%H3867><s%> be joined אִישִׁי֙ <S%H376><s%> will my husband אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because יָלַ֥דְתִּי <S%H3205><s%> unto me because I have born ל֖וֹ שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> him three בָנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> sons עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> after that קָרָֽא־ <S%H7121><s%> called שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> therefore was his name לֵוִֽי׃ <S%H3878><s%> Levi

וַתַּ֨הַר <S%H2029><s%> And she conceived ע֜וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> again and bare בֵּ֗ן <S%H1121><s%> a son וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and she said הַפַּ֙עַם֙ <S%H6471><s%> Now אוֹדֶ֣ה <S%H3034><s%> will I praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> after that קָרְאָ֥ה <S%H7121><s%> therefore she called שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וַֽתַּעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> and left מִלֶּֽדֶת׃ <S%H3205><s%> bearing
